segments.text: Good evening ! I don't believe we've met before . May I introduce myself ? My name is Jack .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a pleasure to meet you . My name is Lucy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm very happy to meet you . You're from the United States , aren't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'm from Salt Lake City .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've been to Salt Lake City a few times . I really like your city .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad to hear that . I think it's the nicest city in the United States .
segments.speaker: S2
